mapper.select: SELECT PA.P_NO, PA.P_UID, PA.P_DATE, PA.P_WAY, PRODUCT_WITH_IMG.PRODUCT_ITEM_NO, PRODUCT_WITH_IMG.ITEM_NAME, PRODUCT_WITH_IMG.PRICE, PRODUCT_WITH_IMG.FILEPATH FROM PAY PA INNER JOIN ( SELECT P.ITEM_NO AS PRODUCT_ITEM_NO, P.ITEM_NAME, P.PRICE, I.FILEPATH FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PRODUCT_IMG I ON P.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO WHERE P.ITEM_NO = #{itemNo} ) PRODUCT_WITH_IMG ON 1=1
